**Need reseller plan option enabled?**
No problem, open ticket after placing order and we will help you with your request.

**Shared Hosting Features**
- Fast Pure SSD Storage;
- Powered by Plesk Control Panel;
- Powered by CloudLinux;
- Auto update of WordPress software and WordPress plugins;
- Auto security enhancement of WordPress software;
- Free SSL Powered by Let's Encrypt for all domains and sub-domains;
- Anti DDoS Protection;
- PHP Selector;
- PHP Composer enabled;
- Ruby enabled;
- Nginx caching enabled;
- Web Application Firewall;
- Daily / Weekly / Monthly Backups;

**Some reasons to host with us:**
- We have a 99.99% uptime guarantee, as we know how to manager service and servers for last 10 years.
- Anti-DDoS Protection.
- Pure SSD Raid Protected Storage.
- You can use Lets' Encrypt SSL certificates on any shared hosting plan.
- Free IPv6 address with every shared hosting account.
- We don’t believe in unlimited lies and offer true shared hosting plans without overselling!
- We use advanced mail filters against SPAM emails.
- We do not oversell resources.
- We use the popular Plesk control panel for all its features and to make it easy to migrate your website to our services.
- We take a nightly backup of all accounts, and store them on a different network, off-site and cloud environment - no way we loose your important files.
- We take more secure measure to protect backup files as we use data vaults.
- We run latest PHP version and available to select from version 5.x to 7.x.
- We run latest Perl, CGI, PHP, Python and Ruby.
- We run latest MariaDB database.
- We are happy to help you to migrate your website to our services.
- We offer a full 14-day money back guarantee*, if you change your mind for any reason.
- Pay by card or crypto;
- After the 14 days, you can still cancel as our plans are monthly rolling*.
- Our hosting plans is cheaper than your cup of coffee (per month).
- We don't believe in unlimited hosting as no such thing as unlimited cup of coffee!

**Need more information?
Have any questions?**
Email: customer.service@web-project.co.uk with your sales inquiries.
